doco: This file stores the OIDs assigned to HL7 and other IGs - for use with the auto-oid-root parameter
PRs are welcome as long as the form is followed, or you can ask Grahame or Reuben to add to this file
The root from which HL7 assigns OIDs for this purpose is 2.16.840.1.113883.4.642.40.1, but they don't have to be in this root
